    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialize all needed attributes and listeners. Called when the view is loaded.

    • handleSearch

      public void handleSearch(Event ev)
      Handle the switch of view when search button is clicked. Called from Main.fxml, from handleKeyPressed(KeyEvent) and from handleMapDoubleClick(MouseEvent), hence ev is Event typed
      Parameters:
      ev - click event

    • handleKeyPressed

      public void handleKeyPressed(KeyEvent ev)
      Handle the display of markers and search proposal events when a key is pressed. Called from Main.fxml
      Parameters:
      ev - a key event

      Parameters:
